name: Commercial Lighting, 90.1 c. 2022
_description: Incremental lighting energy savings and added costs from switching between BAU commercial code in 2023 (assume 90.1-2013) and most recent code (90.1-2022)

energy_efficiency_source.notes: Based on comparison of lighting power densities in Table 9.5.1.; see full calculations at https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1tZHWcn0I0UGFjCTFRHccs_OGH5-WXufgDz5tN_TbHTc/edit?usp=sharing

source_data.title: Standard 90.1-2013 - Energy Standard for Buildings Except Low-Rise Residential Buildings
Standard 90.1-2022 - Energy Standard for Buildings Except Low-Rise Residential Buildings

installed_cost_source.notes: Uses typical 2022 cost for 4 ft. T8 F28 high efficiency and high output in 2 lamp system w/ occupancy sensor

source data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies - Appendix C

product_lifetime_source.notes: Uses typical 2022 lifetime (lamp life divided by operating hours) for 4 ft. T8 F28 high efficiency and high output in 2 lamp system w/ occupancy sensor

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies - Appendix C
